text: (napiyē!) Nām ellā makkaḷaiyum avaravarkaḷuṭaiya talaivarkaḷuṭaṉ aḻaikkum nāḷai (nīr niṉaivūṭṭuvīrāka annāḷil) evaruṭaiya (ceyal kuṟippu) ēṭu avaruṭaiya valakkaiyil koṭukkappaṭukiṟatō, a(ttakai naṟpēṟuṭaiya)varkaḷ tam ēṭukaḷai (nim'matiyuṭaṉ) paṭippārkaḷ; iṉṉum, avarkaṉ aṇuvaḷavum aniyāyam ceyyappaṭa māṭṭārkaḷ
